briefTitle: Evaluation of Efficacy and Safety of Elexacaftor/Tezacaftor/Ivacaftor (ELX/TEZ/IVA) in Cystic Fibrosis Subjects Without an F508del Mutation
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of ELX/TEZ/IVA in Cystic Fibrosis Subjects 6 Years of Age and Older With a Non-F508del ELX/TEZ/IVA-responsive CFTR Mutation
summary: This study evaluated the efficacy, pharmacodynamics (PD) and safety of ELX/TEZ/IVA in participants 6 years of age and older with a non-F508del ELX/TEZ/IVA-responsive cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator gene (CFTR) mutation.

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change in Percent Predicted Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (ppFEV1)

commonTop: Infective pulmonary exacerbation of cystic fibrosis
